column1: Uchi////Bacon Sen - Bacon Sen is a "taste" option which is a thick cut slice of pork belly
column2: and a piece of green onion on a tiny bamboo skewer topped with fish caramel and bonito flakes.Call me a hillbilly all you want but this was no bacon
column3: not even close. I don't understand why pork belly
column4: THE CHEAPEST cut of pork is suddenly THE hit sensation at all these trendy spots. If you're gonna do pork belly
column5: at least render down the fat some and crisp up the top skin to make it crispy and crunchy when you bite.
